data.title: A Canticle For Leibowitz By Walter M. Miller, Jr
data.meta_description: Buy A Canticle For Leibowitz: Book One: The Saint Leibowitz Series By Walter M. Miller, Jr. Available in used condition with free delivery in the UK. ISBN: 9781857230147. ISBN-10: B0092GCOE8
data.text:
The atomic Flame Deluge was over.

The earth was dead.

All knowledge was gone.

In a hellish, barren desert, a humble monk unearth a fragile link to a twentieth century civilization. A hand-written document from the Blessed Saint Leibowitz reads:
